text: M.G. Jayatissa, the Director (Information) has been appointed as the Information Officer of the Department of Government Information under the Right to Information Act. The Act is in force from 3rd February.Meanwhile, the Director General of Government Information Dr. Ranga Kalansooriya will be the Appeal Officer for the Department of Government Information.Appeal Officer -: 011- 2512751            This email address is being protected from spambots. title: Department appoints Officers under RTI Act
